inclusion.criterion: Type 1 diabetics with complete or partial hypoglycemia unawareness.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to comprehend and a willingness to sign an informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current use of neuroactive medication or recreational drugs.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with known heart disease, former myocardial infarction or cardiac arrhythmia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with known epilepsy or in treatment with anti-epileptic drugs for all purposes
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients treated with drugs that are known to influence the EEG, including benzodiazepines and other anxiolytics, anti-depressants and beta-blocking agents
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients that are judged incapable of understanding the patient information or who are not capable of carrying through the investigation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis, but appears well with this episode of hyperglycemia.
